name: CreateExperimentInProject
description:
Create a new experiment within a specified project.

This tool allows you to create a new experiment within a specified project using the Datadog API. It should be called when you want to set up and organize a new experiment under a particular project ID.

parameters.name: project_id_for_experiment_creation
parameters.description: The ID of the project where the experiment will be created. Obtain this by calling the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: experiment_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for the experiment such as name, description, dates, metrics, and configuration settings.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object
